Title: IZOD Advantage Performance Mens Classic Fit Short Sleeve Polo Shirt
Description: Versatile and stylish, the IZOD Advantage Performance polo combines comfort, quality, and fit. This own-it-in-every-color men’s polo is designed for everyday wear with a classic 2-button placket, subtly darker trim, and a roll-resistant collar. Featuring a regular cut, our short-sleeve polo shirt for men is crafted from a naturally stretchy and cooling fabric with UV-15 sun protection that pulls moisture from the skin and dries quickly for added comfort. Our polo is made from a breathable blend of 60% cotton and 40% polyester with Sport Flex technology that allows the lightweight fabric to move with you for maximum flexibility. Available in an assortment of multiple colors and sizes, this men’s shirt is machine washable for easy care. An iconic wardrobe staple, this classic shirt can be styled with anything in your closet to always create the right look. IZOD is an iconic clothing brand that designs men’s apparel with a focus on comfort, quality and fit. Our pants, shirts, activewear, and more are wardrobe essentials that are designed to be classics, season after season.

To conquer the art of layering, start with a versatile base, like these Stylus men's straight-fit flat front pants. They are crafted from super soft fabric and feature a button-zip fly and 5-pocket detailing. Then, pair yours with everything from a tee and a cardigan to a button-down with a blazer.
Front Style: Flat Front
Features: Fly Front
Closure Type: Zipper, Button
Fit: Straight Fit
Pockets: 2 Back Flap Pockets, 1 Front Coin Pocket, 2 Front Flap Pockets
Rise: At Waist
Fiber Content: 100% Polyester
Fabric Description: Tricot
Inseam: 9 3/4 In
Available Colors: "Charcoal Smoke" , "Gray Umbra" , "Black" , "Blue Nights" , "Gold Dust" , "Gray Mist" , "Brown Wren"

Title: Stafford Coolmax All Season Ecomade Mens Stretch Fabric Slim Fit Suit Jacket
Description:
Cut for a classic-fit, Stafford designed this men's blazer with their CoolMax technology woven in its wool-blend stretch fabric to keep you cool and comfortable throughout the seasons. This single-breasted suit jacket has a chest welt pocket, side flap pockets, and inner slip pocket, complete with a two-button closure and a double-vent. Wear with the matching suit pants for a complete formal look.
Front Style: Single Breasted
Features: Stretch Fabric, Lined
Closure Type: Button
Fit: Slim Fit
Pockets: 2 Front Flap Pockets, 1 Inside Button Pocket, 1 Chest Slip Pocket, 1 Inside Slip Pocket
Sleeve Length: Long Sleeve
Sleeve Style: Fitted Sleeve
Fiber Content: 51% Wool, 47% Polyester, 2% Spandex

Title: U.S. Polo Assn. Printed Pique Mens Classic Fit Short Sleeve Polo Shirt
Description:
This U.S. Polo Assn. men's dot-printed short-sleeve polo shirt is the perfect staple for all your sporting and leisure activities. Cut from cotton-pique in a classic-fit, this it has a stripe-trimmed spread collar, a two-button placket, complete with the brand's logo embroidered at the front. Team it with shorts or jeans.

Closure Type: Pullover Head, Button

Care: Machine Wash, Tumble Dry

Description:
Beefy-T - The Hanes Beefy-T shirt. For over 40 years, it has set the standard for the T-shirt comfort and quality, Today it's better than ever—more durable, and with even less shrinkage.

Title: Shaquille O'Neal XLG Mens Big and Tall Linen Blend Short
Description:
These Shaquille O'Neal XLG men's big and tall chino shorts are crafted from a linen-cotton blend making them perfect for warmer temps. Cut for a classic-fit in a mid-length, this pleated front pair have a button-zip fly, a back elastic waistband for added comfort, plus front and back pockets. Style yours with anything from a casual t-shirt to a classic button-down.
Front Style: Pleated Front
Features: Fly Front
Closure Type: Button, Zipper
Fit: Classic Fit
Pockets: 2 Front Slip Pockets, 2 Back Button Pockets
Rise: Mid Rise
Short Length: Mid Length
Fiber Content: 55% Linen, 45% Cotton
Fabric Description: Plain Weave

Title: Stylus Mens Big and Tall Chino Short
Description:
Stay stylish for boating and warm-weather social occasions with this classic pair of men's big and tall deck shorts by Stylus. Made from a textured ribbed fabric, these shorts are cut for a regular-fit with an elasticated waist and button-zip fly, plus multiple pockets to stow small essentials. Wear yours with a polo and boat shoes for a vacation-worthy look.
Front Style: Flat Front
Features: Stretch Fabric
Closure Type: Button, Zipper
Fit: Regular Fit
Pockets: 2 Side Slip Pockets, 1 Back Zip Pocket
Rise: At Waist
Short Length: Mid Length
Fiber Content: 100% Polyester
Fabric Description: Woven, Plain Weave
